sentence: …acidification of the  oceans, rape as a weapon of war, illicit arms sales, and unsustainable  population growth in countries that cannot feed their own people today.  These daunting challenges require regional and global cooperation and  the active involvement of these UN organizations that provide the  necessary expertise, data, strategies, and guidance.…

…safety, and hope to  communities long overlooked, allowing children to study after dark,  families to preserve food, and elders to live with greater comfort.  Despite daunting challenges and limited equipment, the WREC team  completed a demanding project in just eight days--far ahead of  expectations--demonstrating professionalism, humility, and unwavering…
